verses.text: \w Thus|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H7122"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* Ebenezer, \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* Aphek.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w arrayed|strong="H6186"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6186"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w spread|strong="H5203"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w defeated|strong="H5221"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w about|strong="H5221"\w* four thousand \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w battlefield|strong="H4634"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* returned \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* defeat \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*? Let \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* enemies.”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* back \w the|strong="H5375"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w sits|strong="H3427"\w* \w enthroned|strong="H3427"\w* \w between|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, \w Hophni|strong="H2652"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* entered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w raised|strong="H3068"\w* \w such|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w shout|strong="H7321"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ground \w shook|strong="H1949"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w shout|strong="H8643"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*?” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w realized|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* entered \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*,

\w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* gods \w have|strong="H1961"\w* entered \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*!” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* said. “Woe \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w*.

Woe \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H5337"\w*! \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* mighty gods? \w These|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gods \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w plagues|strong="H4347"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H2388"\w* \w courage|strong="H2388"\w* \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w men|strong="H2388"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*! \w Otherwise|strong="H6435"\w*, \w you|strong="H5647"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* just \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H6430"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w you|strong="H5647"\w*. \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w men|strong="H2388"\w* \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w*!”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w defeated|strong="H5062"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* each \w man|strong="H1419"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* tent. \w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*—\w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* thousand \w foot|strong="H7273"\w* \w soldiers|strong="H7273"\w* \w of|strong="H5307"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3947"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w captured|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*’s \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Hophni|strong="H2652"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* Benjamite \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w battle|strong="H4634"\w* \w line|strong="H4634"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w clothes|strong="H4055"\w* \w torn|strong="H7167"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* dirt \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* arrived, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w chair|strong="H3678"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w watching|strong="H6822"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w trembled|strong="H2730"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3427"\w* God. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* entered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5046"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w report|strong="H5046"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w*.

\w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w outcry|strong="H6818"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w commotion|strong="H1995"\w*?” \w So|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w hurried|strong="H4116"\w* \w over|strong="H4100"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*.

Now \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w ninety-eight|strong="H8673"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w gaze|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* fixed because \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.

“\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w battle|strong="H4634"\w*,” \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*. “\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.” “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w happened|strong="H1961"\w*, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*?” \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w messenger|strong="H1319"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4046"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Hophni|strong="H2652"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w captured|strong="H3947"\w*.”

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w soon|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w mentioned|strong="H2142"\w*, \w Eli|strong="H5307"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* backward \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w chair|strong="H3678"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H8179"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w broke|strong="H7665"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w neck|strong="H4665"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5307"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* Eli’s \w daughter-in-law|strong="H3618"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wife \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, \w was|strong="H3205"\w* \w pregnant|strong="H2030"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w news|strong="H8052"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w capture|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* God’s ark \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* deaths \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2524"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* husband, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* collapsed \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w labor|strong="H3205"\w* \w pains|strong="H6735"\w* overtook \w her|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w dying|strong="H4191"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* women \w attending|strong="H5324"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “Do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w given|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*!” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w respond|strong="H6030"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w pay|strong="H7896"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w heed|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* Ichabod, saying, “\w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w departed|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,” because \w the|strong="H3947"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3519"\w* God \w had|strong="H3478"\w* been \w captured|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2524"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* husband \w had|strong="H3478"\w* been killed.

“\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w departed|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3519"\w* God \w has|strong="H3478"\w* been \w captured|strong="H3947"\w*.”
